column5: Unless this can be used to help me catch fish:  http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-20612140
The perpetual trolling machine what a concept.   Art

Ya but must be a reel pain reeling in a few miles of line , and what size of reel do you use ???? You pin guys  , what size spool to hold 1000 or more miles of line , now thats a "DRIFT", how do you know when to mend and than HOW DO YOU  ???
